DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : OTHER NEWS
DOC.TEXT: GE , Swiss Firm Charged With Fixing Diamond Prices : General Electric Co. , De Beers Centenary of Switzerland and two executives were indicted by a federal grand_jury on charges of conspiring to raise and fix the price of industrial diamonds around the world . The Justice_Department said the two firms have 80 % of the market in industrial diamonds , which are man-made gems used in saws to cut stone and concrete , in bits for oil drilling and in machine tools.The one-count indictment , returned in U.S. District Court in Columbus , Ohio , charged that the price-fixing scheme was carried_out by GE manager Peter Frenz and De Beers associate Philippe Liotier beginning in 1991 . It said the increased prices went_into effect worldwide in February and March , 1992 .
